Package view

Class DisplayStaffPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.DisplayPageAb
      • view.DisplayStaffPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayPage
    public class DisplayStaffPage
extends DisplayPageAb
    Boundary class between MainDisplayPage and controller package. Provides printing and display of options in staff module. Inherits from parent class DisplayPageAb.
    Since:
    2019-11-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Wai Leong, Oh Jun Teng, Edhie Wahidin Michelle, Myat Hmu Khin
    See Also:
    controller, MainDisplayPage, DisplayPageAb

      • menu

        public void menu()
        Displays the initial menu page shown to the staff after login. Calls the appropriate methods for each menu option.

      • viewInfo

        public void viewInfo()
        Displays the menu page shown to the staff after selecting the view info option

      • displayAllShowtimes

        public static void displayAllShowtimes()
        Displays all the Showtime entries from showtime database.

      • displayHolWkndDates

        public static void displayHolWkndDates()
        Displays the holiday dates and weekend dates from the Calendar object.

      • displayPrices

        public static void displayPrices()
        Displays all the prices from the Price object.

      • addMovie

        public static void addMovie()
        Allows staff to add a new movie. Takes input from user for the movie details. Creates a new Movie object with the details and adds it into the movie database.

      • editMovieDetails

        public static void editMovieDetails()
        Edits selected movie details. Gets user input to decide which movie to edit. First performs a check in the database to determine if the movie exists. It then uses selection to determine which attribute of the movie to edit.

      • newStaffacc

        public static void newStaffacc()

      • addShowtime

        public static void addShowtime()
        Gets user input for the showtime details for staff to add a new showtime. Checks if the details are valid. Gets input for new time and edits the database
        See Also:
        Showtime

      • editShowtimeDetails

        public static void editShowtimeDetails()
        Gets user input to determine which showtime is to be edited. Checks are done to ensure a existing showtime is edited. Gets input for new time and edits the database.
        See Also:
        Showtime

      • editTicketPrice

        public static void editTicketPrice()
        Edits the attributes of the Price object. Uses selection to determine which attribute to edit.
        See Also:
        Price

      • newHolidayDate

        public static void newHolidayDate()
        Adds a new holiday date to the Calendar object.
        See Also:
        Calendar.addHolArr(String)

      • newWeekendDate

        public static void newWeekendDate()
        Adds a new weekend date to the Calendar object
        See Also:
        Calendar.addWkndArr(String)

        Selection statement to act as confirmation for actions
        Returns:
        input of scanner
